## Checklist

<!-- Mark completed items with an "x" -->

### Code Quality

- [ ] Code follows the project's style guidelines (flake8 passes)
- [ ] Self-review of code completed
- [ ] Code is commented where necessary
- [ ] No new warnings introduced

### Testing

- [ ] Tests pass locally (`pytest`)
- [ ] Test coverage maintained or improved
- [ ] Edge cases tested
- [ ] Error handling tested

### Documentation

- [ ] Docstrings added/updated for new functions
- [ ] README.md updated (if needed)
- [ ] TESTING.md updated (if test changes)
- [ ] API documentation updated (if applicable)
- [ ] Comments added for complex logic

### Security

- [ ] No secrets or credentials committed
- [ ] Security scan passes (bandit)
- [ ] Dependencies reviewed for vulnerabilities

### CheckMK Specific

- [ ] Plugin follows CheckMK v2 API standards
- [ ] Service discovery works correctly
- [ ] Metrics use standard naming conventions
- [ ] Check states (OK/WARN/CRIT) work as expected
- [ ] Configurable thresholds implemented (if applicable)
